nt_bdr wrote:
> I have the scope of the crawl set to SURT Scope. If I have the
> following entry in the seed list - www.xdrive.com. Will the crawler
> crawl xdrive.com aswell?

Both the SurtPrefixScope and the SurtPrefixedDecideRule (used in a 
DecidingScope) will convert that seed into an implied SURT prefix that 
includes the 'www' -- so URLs on 'xdrive.com' or other subdomains of 
'xdrive.com' will not be crawled.

If you add a line...

+xdrive.com

...to your seeds file (and are using a SURT-based scope that looks for 
these kind of lines) it will broaden the necessary URL-accepting prefix 
so that it accepts 'xdrive.com' and all subdomains as part of the scope.

- Gordon @ IA
